body:
Are you guys alright? Please contact me if you're still alive n' jackin.

There seems to be helicopter roaming  around our place today.

S.W.A.T r raiding each houses and mine is next.

Please stay safe.
By Jack o loli
Im hearing sirens getting closer to my house. Is that normal?
Same thing is happening over here, beter take a look to make sure nothing bad happened.
